# Nested template calls should propagate the data type correctly.

check-templates

-- go.mod --
module example.com/app

go 1.25.0
-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"fmt"
	"html/template"
	"io"
)

var (
	//go:embed *.gohtml
	source embed.FS

	templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "*"))
)

type Page struct {
	Title string
}

func render() {
	_ = templates.ExecuteTemplate(io.Discard, "index.gohtml", Page{})
}

var _ = fmt.Sprint

-- index.gohtml --
{{template "header.gohtml" .}}
<p>body</p>
-- header.gohtml --
<h1>{{.Title}}</h1>
